text: __NOTOC__ This is a list of players who graduated from the Nationwide Tour in 2007. The top 25 players on the Nationwide Tour's money list in 2007 earned their PGA Tour card for 2008. {|class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" ! !!colspan=2|2007 Nationwide 28 || 15 || || 141 || 708,549 |-style="background:#F08080;" |align=left| Jimmy Walker||25||196,896|| 24 || 13 || || 185 || 282,249 |} *PGA Tour rookie for 2008. #Flanagan received a battlefield promotion to the PGA Tour in 2007 by winning three tournaments on the Nationwide Tour in 2007. On the PGA Tour in 2007, he played in 4 tournaments and made 2 cuts. In the two tournaments that he made the cut in, he finished in a tie for 17th and in a tie for 18th. T = Tied Green background indicates the player retained his PGA Tour card for 2009 (won or finished inside the top 125). Yellow background indicates the player did not retain his PGA Tour card for 2009, but retained conditional status (finished between 126–150). Red background indicates the player did not retain his PGA Tour card for 2009 (finished outside the top 150). ==Winners on the PGA Tour in 2008== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" !No.!!Date!!Player!!Tournament!!Winning score!!Margin of victory!!Runner-up |- |1 |Jul 27 | Chez Reavie |RBC Canadian Open |−17 (65-64-68-70=267) |3 strokes | Billy Mayfair |- |2 |Oct 18 | Marc Turnesa |Justin Timberlake Shriners Hospitals for Children Open |−25 (62-64-69-68=263) |1 stroke | Matt Kuchar |} ==Runners-up on the PGA Tour in 2008== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%;" !No.!!Date!!Player!!Tournament!!Winner!!Winning score!!Runner-up score |- |1 |Sep 21 | Marc Turnesa Lost in three-man playoff |Viking Classic | Will MacKenzie |−19 (70-64-67-68=269) |−19 (65-68-66-70=269) |- |2 |rowspan=2|Nov 2 | Michael Letzig |rowspan=2|Ginn sur Mer Classic |rowspan=2| Ryan Palmer |rowspan=2|−7 (67-71-72-71=281) |−6 (65-74-70-73=282) |- |3 | Nicholas Thompson |−6 (71-70-72-69=282) |} ==See also== *2007 PGA Tour Qualifying School graduates ==References== *All information from here, individual player profiles and golfstats.com. *Money list *Player profiles Category:Korn Ferry Tour Category:PGA Tour Nationwide Tour Graduates Nationwide Tour Graduates
